description: The "Gentleman" of the "Four Heavenly Kings," he is good friends with Toriko. While Toriko mostly relies on his brute strength, Coco prefers using stealthy techniques and cunning strategy to subdue aggressors. He is also strong defensively. He is immune to five hundred different kinds of poison. He earns most of his living by working as a fortuneteller; his fortunes have a 97% accuracy rating, which also makes him extremely popular with women and as a result he is mobbed by costumers when he is in public. He also has the ability to see non-visible spectrums of light and can read electromagnetic auras in order to predict an animal`s next action. He and the other Four Heavenly Kings were trained by Ichiryuu, the president of the IGO.
name: Coco
